Description.val:
Mod 470006 includes Ground Segment and Communications System DMS/Obsolescence mitigation. 

The Global Hawk System provides high altitude, deep look, long endurance intelligence, surveillance, and reconnaissance (ISR) capability that complements space and other airborne collectors during peacetime, crisis, and war-fighting scenarios.

The Global Hawk program will incorporate applicable synergies with other platforms, including the U.S. Navy Triton, USAF Predator/Reaper, and other UAV weapon systems.

The Global Hawk System will be continually modified to maintain pace with the evolving threat and the increasing capabilities included in modernization efforts.  These planned modifications include aircraft, ground station and support retrofits to incorporate new capabilities or meet mandated equipment standards.

Funding procures hardware for both Ground Segment and Communication System DMS/Obsolescence mitigation; also funds the installation and integration costs associated with DMS efforts across both segments.  Communication System DMS/Obsolescence mitigation will modify both the Aircraft and the Ground Segment.

Justification.val: Where applicable, justification for individual modifications is provided in the P-3A exhibits.

Model.val: Block 10/20/30/40 Ground Stations and Comm Systems

Description.val:
Mod 470006 includes Ground Segment and Communication System DMS/Obsolescence mitigation. 

The Global Hawk System provides high altitude, deep look, long endurance intelligence, surveillance, and reconnaissance (ISR) capability that complements space and other airborne collectors during peacetime, crisis, and war-fighting scenarios.

The Global Hawk program will incorporate applicable synergies with other platforms, including the U.S. Navy Triton, USAF Predator/Reaper, and other UAV weapon systems.

The Global Hawk System will be continually modified to maintain pace with the evolving threat and the increasing capabilities included in modernization efforts.  These planned modifications include aircraft, ground station and support retrofits to incorporate new capabilities or meet mandated equipment standards.

Funding procures hardware for both Ground Segment and Communication System DMS/Obsolescence mitigation; also funds the installation and integration costs associated with DMS efforts across both segments.  Communication System DMS/Obsolescence mitigation will modify both the Aircraft and the Ground Segment.

DMS/Obsolescence Mitigation efforts will be conducted on 15 Total Aircraft, 3 Mission Control Elements (MCE), 6 Launch and Recovery Elements (LRE) and 3 Communications Automatic Test Equipment Carts (CATE).  Ground Segment and Commnication Hardware needed to be procured includes, but not limited to, radios, modems, circuit boards and cards, power supplies and display units.

Milestone/Development Status

Ground Segment and Communication System DMS/Obsolescence mitigation
